import{useContext,useState}from"react";import{v4 as uuidv4}from'uuid';import{TodoContext}from"../context/TodoContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskForm=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const[desc,setDesc]=useState("");const[deadline,setDeadline]=useState("");const{setTasks}=useContext(TodoContext);const addTask=e=>{e.preventDefault();let newTask={title:title,desc:desc,deadline:deadline,id:uuidv4()};setTasks(prevTasks=>[...prevTasks,newTask]);};return/*#__PURE__*/ (// .taskform_main
_jsxs("div",{className:"taskform_main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add a new task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"taskform_form",onSubmit:e=>addTask(e),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",required:true,onChange:e=>setDesc(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Deadline:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",required:true,onChange:e=>setDeadline(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"taskform_buttom",children:"+ Add Task"})]})]}));};export default TaskForm;
